title: How to Make Cherry Chocolates

steps.headline: Place 4 ounces of chocolate in one bowl and 2 ounces in the other.
Melt the chocolate.
steps.description: Put the bowl with 4 ounces of chocolate in it in the microwave and stir every 10 seconds. Once it is almost all melted, put it to one side.

steps.headline: Add to the other bowl the same amount of condensed milk, by weight, as there is chocolate in that bowl (2 ounces in this example).
Add the butter to the condensed milk and chocolate.
Microwave until the chocolate and butter are melted, stirring every 10 seconds.
Add a few drops of cherry liquor and mix well.
Coat the sides of the chocolate moulds with melted chocolate.
steps.description: A teaspoon or a knife will work fine for this.

steps.headline: Chop the glacé cherries in half.
Push a fork through the flat side of one of the cherry halves and dip in the condensed milk and chocolate mixture.
steps.description: Put the cherry into one of the chocolate moulds. Repeat for the rest of the chocolates.

steps.headline: Fill the moulds to the top with melted chocolate and put in the fridge to set.
Remove the chocolates from the moulds once set.

text: Place 4 ounces of chocolate in one bowl and 2 ounces in the other.  Melt the chocolate. Put the bowl with 4 ounces of chocolate in it in the microwave and stir every 10 seconds. Once it is almost all melted, put it to one side. Add to the other bowl the same amount of condensed milk, by weight, as there is chocolate in that bowl (2 ounces in this example).  Add the butter to the condensed milk and chocolate.  Microwave until the chocolate and butter are melted, stirring every 10 seconds.  Add a few drops of cherry liquor and mix well.  Coat the sides of the chocolate moulds with melted chocolate. A teaspoon or a knife will work fine for this. Chop the glacé cherries in half.  Push a fork through the flat side of one of the cherry halves and dip in the condensed milk and chocolate mixture. Put the cherry into one of the chocolate moulds. Repeat for the rest of the chocolates. Fill the moulds to the top with melted chocolate and put in the fridge to set.  Remove the chocolates from the moulds once set.
